comment: Poll time. Let's see how many NatSocs we can force to lie lol NatSocs! If you had to move to live in the Middle East permanently with your wife and kids, living totally under your host country's laws and customs, where would you prefer to go?
amr:
# ::snt Poll time. Let's see how many NatSocs we can force to lie lol NatSocs! If you had to move to live in the Middle East permanently with your wife and kids, living totally under your host country's laws and customs, where would you prefer to go?
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (t / time
            :mod (p / poll-01))
      :snt2 (l / let-01
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (w / we)
            :ARG1 (s / see-01
                  :ARG0 w
                  :ARG1 (n / number
                        :quant-of (o / organization
                              :name (n2 / name
                                    :op1 "NatSoc")
                              :ARG1-of (f / force-01
                                    :ARG0 w
                                    :ARG2 (l2 / lie-08
                                          :ARG0 o)
                                    :ARG1-of (p2 / possible-01)
                                    :ARG2-of (l3 / laugh-01
                                          :ARG0 w
                                          :manner (l4 / loud)))))))
      :snt3 (p3 / prefer-01
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (g / go-02
                  :ARG0 y
                  :ARG4 (a / amr-unknown)
                  :condition (o2 / obligate-01
                        :ARG1 y
                        :ARG2 (l5 / live-01
                              :ARG0 y
                              :location (w2 / world-region
                                    :name (n3 / name
                                          :op1 "Middle"
                                          :op2 "East"))
                              :accompanier (a2 / and
                                    :op1 (p4 / person
                                          :ARG0-of (h / have-rel-role-91
                                                :ARG1 y
                                                :ARG2 (w3 / wife)))
                                    :op2 (p5 / person
                                          :ARG0-of (h2 / have-rel-role-91
                                                :ARG1 y
                                                :ARG2 (k / kid))))
                              :manner (u / under
                                    :op1 (a3 / and
                                          :op1 (l6 / law
                                                :poss (c / country
                                                      :ARG0-of (h3 / host-01
                                                            :ARG1 y)))
                                          :op2 (c2 / custom
                                                :poss c))
                                    :degree (t2 / total)))))))

      :op2 (o / offend-01

                  :ARG0 w
                  :ARG1 (c2 / comment-01
